dct_title_s: [Maps of the Holy Land and China]
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on each map given in "Lieues d'Allemagne" and "Lieues de France".
Each map is surrounded by illustrated frames.
Decorative cartouches and compass rose on each map.
2 pictorial vignettes: [The Holy Land and a holy man] -- [China and men].
Shows topography, drainage, vegetation, boundaries, tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
